labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.expected_result: Spotify Listen along gets shared without any incidents.
data.short_description: When commenting in the invitiation sharing for Spotify, Discord Crashes (Original Reporter: Brenden Conner#0001 )
data.steps_to_repro: - Listen to a song on Spotify. - Go to any channels, click on the plus. - Click on invite the channel. - Write an comment, then click on enter or send. - Observe.
